info.description:
API documentation for the Endeavour Health Common Interface Mechanism.
NOTES

Sample data and notes on usage can be viewed here and FHIR profiles can be viewed here.

Build last updated: 14-Mar-2016
info.title: Common Interface Mechanism

200.description: OK | PrimaryCare-Organization resource

get.description: Get organisation details by ODS code.

200.description: OK | PrimaryCare-Organization resource
OK | PrimaryCare-Location resource
OK | Person resource

get.description: Get appointment schedules by date and/or practitioner ID.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Search for schedules within the date(s) specified

parameters.name: actor:Practitioner
parameters.description: Search for schedules with the practitioner ID specified

200.description: OK | Bundle containing zero or more PrimaryCare-Schedule resources

get.description: Get appointment slots by schedule ID.

parameters.name: schedule
parameters.description: Search for slots with the schedule ID specified

200.description: OK | Bundle containing zero or more PrimaryCare-Slot resources

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patient ID wrapped in Parameters resource.

parameters.description: Patient ID wrapped in Parameters Resource.

200.description: OK | TBD

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: Search for appointments with the patient ID specified

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Search for appointments within the date(s) specified

200.description: OK | Bundle containing zero or more PrimaryCare-Appointment resources
OK | A bundle of PrimaryCare-Task resources

post.description: Add a task at a given organisation

200.description: OK | TBD

get.description: Retrieve a task from a given organisation

200.description: OK | TBD
OK | A bundle of PrimaryCare-Task resources
OK | A bundle of PrimaryCare-Task resources

get.summary: Get full record by patient ID
get.description: Get full record (demographic and clinical) by patient ID, excluding binaries and attachments.

200.description: OK | Bundle containing multiple resource types constituting the patients full record

get.summary: Get medication prescriptions by patient ID
get.description: Get medication prescriptions by patient ID

200.description: OK | Bundle containing zero or more PrimaryCare-Medication resources
OK | Bundle containing zero or more PrimaryCare-Condition resources
OK | Bundle containing zero or more PrimaryCare-Immunization resources
OK | Bundle containing zero or more PrimaryCare-AllergyIntolerance resources

get.description:
Trace persons.

Valid trace combinations:

  • Person identifier
  • Person name AND date of birth AND gender

200.description: OK | Bundle containing zero or more Person resources and zero or more associated PrimaryCare-Patient resources
OK | PrimaryCare-Patient resource

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: Date after which the patient record was last updated

200.description: OK | Bundle containing zero or more PrimaryCare-Patient resources

400Response.description: Required parameter missing; Invalid parameter | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Required element missing; Element value invalid

401Response.description: Security failed | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Unknown user

403Response.description: No legitimate relationship | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Information suppressed

404PatientNotFoundResponse.description: Patient not found | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Not found

404OrganizationNotFoundResponse.description: Organization not found | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Not found

404LocationNotFoundResponse.description: Location not found | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Not found

404SlotOrPatientNotFoundResponse.description: Slot not found; Patient not found | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Not found

409SlotAlreadyBookedResponse.description: Slot already booked | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Edit version conflict

409IdentifierInUseResponse.description: Identifier in use | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Edit version conflict

412SlotAlreadyBookedByThisPatientRespons.description: Slot already booked by this patient | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Business rule violation

412SlotNotBookedByThisPatientResponse.description: Slot not booked by this patient | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Business rule violation

500Response.description: Unexpected error | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Exception

502Response.description: Error received from principal system | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Exception

504Response.description: Connection timeout to principal system | OperationOutcome with IssueType of Timeout

display.example: I saw this patient with an asthma attack at the weekend, which are getting increasingly frequent. I noted that he has not had an asthma review for some time. I think a recall for a review would be worthwhile.
